s3.message: Fixed: Blocking from context menu sometimes doesn't work if the context menu has a submenu (forum topic).

s2.message: Added a way to disable automatic filter subscription updates by means of a hidden preference (forum topic).

s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 2.0.2.

s6.message: Blockable items: Fixed "Disable filter on site" feature (forum topic).

s5.message: Filter Preferences: Fixed the default width of the "Enabled" column (forum topic).

s4.message: Fixed: Tabs on Flash and Java sometimes disappear before they can be clicked (forum topic).
